data.title: Where To Watch
data.meta_description: Homer and Marge Simpson raise Bart, Lisa, and baby Maggie in Springfield.
data.text:
Wednesday, August 14

12:00 AM

The Devil Wears Nada

Season 21 • Episode 5

To raise money for charity, Marge and the "Philanthro-Chicks" decide to pose for a calendar.

Wednesday, August 14

1:00 AM

Rednecks and Broomsticks

Season 21 • Episode 7

While wandering in a field after getting lost, Lisa discovers three teens who are Wiccans.

Wednesday, August 14

1:30 AM

One Angry Lisa

Season 34 • Episode 2

Lisa gets called for jury duty; Marge becomes obsessed with her exercise bike.

Wednesday, August 14

2:00 PM

Burns Verkaufen der Kraftwerk

Season 3 • Episode 11

Homer is laid off when Mr. Burns sells the nuclear plant to a German corporation.

Wednesday, August 14

2:30 PM

I Married Marge

Season 3 • Episode 12

Marge thinks she is pregnant, prompting Homer to relive their early years.

Wednesday, August 14

3:00 PM

Radio Bart

Season 3 • Episode 13

Bart fools the town into thinking a child has fallen down a well.

Wednesday, August 14

4:00 PM

Homer Alone

Season 3 • Episode 15

When Marge goes to a health spa, Homer is left alone with baby Maggie.

Wednesday, August 14

4:30 PM

Bart the Lover

Season 3 • Episode 16

Bart pretends to be an available millionaire when he answers his teacher's personal ad.

Thursday, August 15

12:30 AM

Once Upon a Time in Springfield

Season 21 • Episode 10

Krusty is forced to restructure the format of his TV show.

Thursday, August 15

1:00 AM

Million-Dollar Maybe

Season 21 • Episode 11

Homer misses a date with Marge so he can buy a lottery ticket.

Thursday, August 15

1:30 AM

The King of Nice

Season 34 • Episode 4

Marge is hired as a segment producer on Krusty's new daytime talk show.

Thursday, August 15

2:30 PM

Separate Vocations

Season 3 • Episode 18

Aptitude tests reveal Lisa should be a homemaker and Bart should be a police officer.

Thursday, August 15

3:00 PM

Dog of Death

Season 3 • Episode 19

The Simpsons are so caught up in the approaching lottery they fail to notice their dog is ill.

Thursday, August 15

4:00 PM

Black Widower

Season 3 • Episode 21

A "Krusty the Clown" performer gets out of prison and proposes to Selma.

Thursday, August 15

4:30 PM

The Otto Show

Season 3 • Episode 22

Bart invites Otto to live with the family after he gets fired for not having a driver's license.

Friday, August 16

12:30 AM

Postcards From the Wedge

Season 21 • Episode 14

Homer and Marge meet with Principal Skinner after Bart fails to turn in his homework.

Friday, August 16

1:30 AM

From Beer to Paternity

Season 34 • Episode 7

Homer goes on a road trip with Lisa that threatens to expose Homer's terrible parenting.

Friday, August 16

2:00 PM

Bart's Friend Falls in Love

Season 3 • Episode 23

Bart feels left out when his friend Milhouse falls for the new girl in school.

Friday, August 16

2:30 PM

Brother, Can You Spare Two Dimes?

Season 3 • Episode 24

When it's discovered he's been exposed to radiation, the nuclear power plant awards Homer $2,000.

Friday, August 16

3:00 PM

Homer the Heretic

Season 4 • Episode 3

Homer decides he doesn't need church and forms his own religion.

Friday, August 16

3:30 PM

Lisa the Beauty Queen

Season 4 • Episode 4

Homer tries to boost Lisa's confidence by entering her in a beauty pageant.

Friday, August 16

4:00 PM

Treehouse of Horror III

Season 4 • Episode 5

Halloween tales: A doll comes alive; Homer is a giant on an island; Bart entrances the town.

Friday, August 16

4:30 PM

Itchy & Scratchy: The Movie

Season 4 • Episode 6

To punish Bart, Homer forbids him to see the new "Itchy & Scratchy" movie.

Saturday, August 17

12:00 AM

American History X-cellent

Season 21 • Episode 17

Mr. Burns is questioned when a police officer sees a stolen painting at the billionaire's estate.

Saturday, August 17

1:00 AM

The Squirt and the Whale

Season 21 • Episode 19

The Simpsons build a wind turbine in their backyard; Homer and Lisa try to help a beached whale.

Saturday, August 17

4:00 PM

The Man Who Came to Be Dinner

Season 26 • Episode 10

The Simpsons board the wrong ride at Dizzneeland and end up on Kang and Kodos' home planet.

Saturday, August 17

4:30 PM

Treehouse of Horror I

Season 2 • Episode 3

Bart and Lisa try to outdo each other with scary Halloween stories.

Saturday, August 17

7:00 PM

Treehouse of Horror XXII

Season 23 • Episode 3

A boulder traps Homer's arm when he takes a drive through a canyon; a spider bite paralyzes Homer.

Saturday, August 17

7:30 PM

Treehouse of Horror XXX

Season 31 • Episode 4

Milhouse is trapped in another dimension; dead Homer's spirit tries some new bodies on for size.

Sunday, August 18

4:00 PM

Marge Gets a Job

Season 4 • Episode 7

Marge finds herself fighting off Mr. Burns' advances when she gets a job at the power plant.

Sunday, August 18

4:30 PM

New Kid on the Block

Season 4 • Episode 8

Bart falls for a 15-year-old baby sitter and tries to win her heart.

Sunday, August 18

5:00 PM

Mr. Plow

Season 4 • Episode 9

Homer becomes a neighborhood hero when he buys a snowplow and clears his neighbors' driveways.

Sunday, August 18

5:30 PM

Homer's Triple Bypass

Season 4 • Episode 11

When Homer learns he needs a heart bypass operation, he searches for the cheapest doctor.

Sunday, August 18

6:30 PM

Selma's Choice

Season 4 • Episode 13

Selma decides she wants a baby and conducts a search for the perfect father.

Sunday, August 18

7:00 PM

Brother From the Same Planet

Season 4 • Episode 14

Bart says he's an orphan so a big-brother organization will assign him a great dad.

Sunday, August 18

7:30 PM

I Love Lisa

Season 4 • Episode 15

Lisa faces the obsessive love of a classmate after she sends him a valentine out of pity.

Sunday, August 18

9:00 PM

Duffless

Season 4 • Episode 16

Homer vows to quit drinking for 30 days after he is stopped for drunken driving.

Monday, August 19

1:00 AM

So It's Come to This: The Simpsons Clip Show

Season 4 • Episode 18

A practical joke puts Homer in the hospital, where the family flashes back.

Monday, August 19

2:30 PM

Marge in Chains

Season 4 • Episode 21

Marge is arrested for shoplifting and is forced to undergo a devastating day in court.

Monday, August 19

3:00 PM

Krusty Gets Kancelled

Season 4 • Episode 22

Bart and Lisa organize a celebrity-studded comeback special for an out-of-work Krusty the Clown.

Monday, August 19

3:30 PM

Homer's Barbershop Quartet

Season 5 • Episode 1

Homer recounts his trials and tribulations as a member of a barbershop quartet.

Monday, August 19

4:00 PM

Cape Feare

Season 5 • Episode 2

"Sideshow Bob" returns to Springfield for revenge against Bart for exposing his murder plot.

Monday, August 19

4:30 PM

Homer Goes to College

Season 5 • Episode 3

Homer is forced back into college after he fails a competency test at the power plant.

Tuesday, August 20

12:00 AM

Moe Letter Blues

Season 21 • Episode 21

Moe threatens to run away with the wife of either Homer, Apu or the Rev. Lovejoy.

Tuesday, August 20

12:30 AM

The Bob Next Door

Season 21 • Episode 22

Bart becomes convinced that his new neighbor is actually archenemy Sideshow Bob.

Tuesday, August 20

1:00 AM

Judge Me Tender

Season 21 • Episode 23

After displaying a talent for judging contests, Moe is invited to appear on "American Idol."

Tuesday, August 20

3:00 PM

Marge on the Lam

Season 5 • Episode 6

Marge and her new neighbor have a girls' night out and end up on the wrong side of the law.

Tuesday, August 20

3:30 PM

Bart's Inner Child

Season 5 • Episode 7

Homer and Marge take Bart to a self-help seminar to alter his rebellious behavior.

Tuesday, August 20

4:00 PM

Boy-Scoutz 'N the Hood

Season 5 • Episode 8

Bart and Homer go on a father-son rafting trip and end up hopelessly adrift at sea.

Wednesday, August 21

12:30 AM

Lisa Simpson, This Isn't Your Life

Season 22 • Episode 5

Fearing that she will end up like Marge, Lisa pledges to focus solely on her academics.

Wednesday, August 21

1:00 AM

The Fool Monty

Season 22 • Episode 6

Mr. Burns is distraught at the town's reaction to the announcement that he has only weeks to live.

Wednesday, August 21

2:30 PM

Homer the Vigilante

Season 5 • Episode 11

Fed up with Springfield's finest, Homer forms a vigilante group to catch a cat burglar.

Wednesday, August 21

3:00 PM

Bart Gets Famous

Season 5 • Episode 12

Bart stumbles into stardom when he lands a walk-on role on the "Krusty the Clown Show.".

Wednesday, August 21

3:30 PM

Homer and Apu

Season 5 • Episode 13

Homer and Apu travel to the Himalayas to find Kwik-E-Mart headquarters and get Apu's job back.

Wednesday, August 21

4:30 PM

Deep Space Homer

Season 5 • Episode 15

Barney and Homer compete to become the first average American in space.

Thursday, August 22

12:00 AM

Donnie Fatso

Season 22 • Episode 9

Homer ends up in the Springfield penitentiary after getting caught bribing an official.

Thursday, August 22

12:30 AM

Moms I'd Like to Forget

Season 22 • Episode 10

Marge reconnects with a close group of mothers she used to be friends with.

Thursday, August 22

2:00 PM

Homer Loves Flanders

Season 5 • Episode 16

Homer decides to become Flanders' new best friend after attending a football game with him.

Thursday, August 22

2:30 PM

Bart Gets an Elephant

Season 5 • Episode 17

Bart chooses a full-grown elephant as his prize when he wins a radio contest.

Thursday, August 22

3:00 PM

Burns' Heir

Season 5 • Episode 18

After a near-death experience, Mr. Burns realizes he has no heir and holds auditions to select one.

Thursday, August 22

4:00 PM

The Boy Who Knew Too Much

Season 5 • Episode 20

Bart faces a difficult decision when he witnesses a crime while playing hooky.

Thursday, August 22

4:30 PM

Lady Bouvier's Lover

Season 5 • Episode 21

Marge meets with surprising success when she plays matchmaker for Homer's father and her mother.

Friday, August 23

12:00 AM

The Blue and the Gray

Season 22 • Episode 13

Moe attends a seminar in hope of gaining more confidence with women; Marge makes a change.

Friday, August 23

12:30 AM

Angry Dad: The Movie

Season 22 • Episode 14

Bart's film about an angry father quickly becomes a critical favorite, winning him several awards.

Friday, August 23

1:00 AM

The Scorpion's Tale

Season 22 • Episode 15

During a field trip, Lisa discovers desert water that makes usually combative creatures get along.

Friday, August 23

1:30 AM

My Life as a Vlog

Season 34 • Episode 12

The story of the rise and fall of the Simpson family vlog is revealed.

Friday, August 23

3:00 PM

Lisa's Rival

Season 6 • Episode 2

Lisa's world turns upside down when she learns that a new classmate can play the saxophone better.

Saturday, August 24

12:00 AM

Love Is a Many Strangled Thing

Season 22 • Episode 17

Marge persuades Homer to enroll in a fathering enrichment class; Bart becomes a school bully.

Saturday, August 24

1:00 AM

The Real Housewives of Fat Tony

Season 22 • Episode 19

Fat Tony and Marge's sister, Selma, fall in love and get married; Bart discovers a special ability.

Saturday, August 24

1:30 AM

The Many Saints of Springfield

Season 34 • Episode 13

When Ned Flanders falls on hard times, Fat Tony makes him an offer he can't refuse.

Saturday, August 24

4:00 PM

Thirty Minutes Over Tokyo

Season 10 • Episode 23

The Simpsons visit Tokyo, where they become contestants on a game show.

Saturday, August 24

4:30 PM

Hunka Hunka Burns in Love

Season 13 • Episode 4

A factory hires Homer to write blurbs for fortune cookies, and one of them changes Mr. Burns' life.

Saturday, August 24

5:00 PM

Goo Goo Gai Pan

Season 16 • Episode 12

Homer must pretend to be Selma's husband so she can adopt a baby girl from China.

Saturday, August 24

5:30 PM

What Animated Women Want

Season 24 • Episode 17

Milhouse, inspired by "A Streetcar Named Desire," tries to attract Lisa with a bad-boy persona.

Saturday, August 24

6:30 PM

Pork and Burns

Season 28 • Episode 11

Marge becomes obsessed with the Japanese way of life; Homer must find a new home for the family pig.

Saturday, August 24

7:00 PM

No Good Read Goes Unpunished

Season 29 • Episode 15

Marge forces everyone to give up electronics for the day and take a trip to a book store.

Saturday, August 24

7:30 PM

E My Sports

Season 30 • Episode 17

As Bart begins to excel in video game competitions, Homer discovers a passion for coaching him.

Sunday, August 25

4:30 PM

Bart's Girlfriend

Season 6 • Episode 7

Bart falls hard for a preacher's daughter who ends up being not-so-innocent.

Sunday, August 25

5:00 PM

Lisa on Ice

Season 6 • Episode 8

Lisa and Bart are put in direct competition when Lisa joins a hockey team to avoid failing gym.

Sunday, August 25

5:30 PM

Homer Badman

Season 6 • Episode 9

Homer is accused of sexual harassment by a babysitter and the incident is made into a TV movie.

Sunday, August 25

6:00 PM

Grandpa vs. Sexual Inadequacy

Season 6 • Episode 10

Grandpa's passion potion becomes a hit after it works wonders for Marge and Homer's drab sex life.

Sunday, August 25

8:00 PM

Clan of the Cave Mom

Season 35 • Episode 13

A parenting disagreement between Marge and Luann Van Houten escalates into a struggle for survival.

Sunday, August 25

9:00 PM

Homie the Clown

Season 6 • Episode 15

Clown college graduate Homer's gigs are so successful, the mob believes he is Krusty.

Monday, August 26

1:00 AM

Homer vs. Patty and Selma

Season 6 • Episode 17

Patty and Selma hold a bad investment over Homer's head, forcing him to cater to their every whim.

Monday, August 26

1:30 AM

A Star Is Burns

Season 6 • Episode 18

Marge comes up with a plan to increase Springfield's popularity.

Monday, August 26

2:00 PM

Lisa's Wedding

Season 6 • Episode 19

Lisa looks into her future when she visits a fortuneteller's booth.

Monday, August 26

2:30 PM

Two Dozen and One Greyhounds

Season 6 • Episode 20

Mr. Burns steals a litter of puppies, with plans to make a Greyhound-skin tuxedo.

Monday, August 26

3:00 PM

The PTA Disbands

Season 6 • Episode 21

When the faculty strikes at Bart's school, PTA member Marge becomes his teacher.

Monday, August 26

3:30 PM

Round Springfield

Season 6 • Episode 22

When Lisa's friend dies, she seeks a way to honor the jazz-man.

Monday, August 26

4:00 PM

The Springfield Connection

Season 6 • Episode 23

After apprehending a criminal, Marge enrolls in the police academy.

Tuesday, August 27

12:00 AM

500 Keys

Season 22 • Episode 21

The Simpsons find the keys to every door in Springfield; Lisa finds a room beneath the school.

Tuesday, August 27

12:30 AM

The Ned-liest Catch

Season 22 • Episode 22

When Ned starts dating Mrs. Krabappel, he is surprised to learn how many men she has been with.

Tuesday, August 27

3:00 PM

Radioactive Man

Season 7 • Episode 2

Milhouse and Bart vie for a role in a Hollywood film being made in Springfield.

Tuesday, August 27

3:30 PM

Home Sweet Homediddly-Dum-Doodily

Season 7 • Episode 3

Bart, Lisa and Maggie are sent to live next door with the Flanders, their new foster parents.

Tuesday, August 27

4:00 PM

Bart Sells His Soul

Season 7 • Episode 4

Unfazed by a post-prank reprimand from the Rev. Lovejoy, Bart sells his soul for $5.

Tuesday, August 27

4:30 PM

Lisa the Vegetarian

Season 7 • Episode 5

Lisa gives up meat on the eve of Homer's big barbecue.

Wednesday, August 28

12:30 AM

The Food Wife

Season 23 • Episode 5

Marge, Bart and Lisa start their own food blog and land a reservation at a popular restaurant.

Wednesday, August 28

1:00 AM

The Book Job

Season 23 • Episode 6

Homer creates a team, including author Neil Gaiman, to write the next hit "tween" book.

Wednesday, August 28

1:30 AM

Bartless

Season 34 • Episode 15

Marge and Homer dream of a world in which their rambunctious son was never a Simpson.

Wednesday, August 28

2:00 PM

Treehouse of Horror VI

Season 7 • Episode 6

Parodies of '50s monster movies, "Nightmare on Elm Street" and "The Twilight Zone."

Wednesday, August 28

2:30 PM

King-Size Homer

Season 7 • Episode 7

Homer hopes an eating binge will help him weigh in at 300 pounds so he can work at home.

Wednesday, August 28

3:00 PM

Mother Simpson

Season 7 • Episode 8

Homer finds out that his mother is alive and still on the lam.

Wednesday, August 28

3:30 PM

Sideshow Bob's Last Gleaming

Season 7 • Episode 9

Springfield's air show turns explosive with the arrival of an atomic bomb-toting Sideshow Bob.

Wednesday, August 28

4:00 PM

The Simpsons 138th Episode Spectacular

Season 7 • Episode 10

Host Troy McClure presents a retrospective of the show.

Wednesday, August 28

4:30 PM

Marge Be Not Proud

Season 7 • Episode 11

Bart is accused of shoplifting and panics when Marge plans a family portrait at the same store.

Thursday, August 29

12:00 AM

The Ten-Per-Cent Solution

Season 23 • Episode 8

Krusty the Clown's very first agent, Annie, tries to craft his comeback.

Thursday, August 29

12:30 AM

Politically Inept With Homer Simpson

Season 23 • Episode 10

After a video of Homer ranting goes viral, he gets his own political talk show.

Thursday, August 29

1:00 AM

The D'oh-cial Network

Season 23 • Episode 11

Lisa is called to trial after her online social networking site creates chaos in the community.

Thursday, August 29

1:30 AM

Hostile Kirk Place

Season 34 • Episode 16

Milhouse's dad takes exception to a history lesson that paints one of his ancestors in a bad light.

Thursday, August 29

2:00 PM

Team Homer

Season 7 • Episode 12

Homer forms his own bowling league; Bart starts a riot at school.

Thursday, August 29

2:30 PM

Two Bad Neighbors

Season 7 • Episode 13

President George H.W. Bush buys a house across the street from the Simpsons.

Thursday, August 29

3:00 PM

Scenes From the Class Struggle in Springfield

Season 7 • Episode 14

Marge joins Springfield's social elite and becomes obsessed with maintaining her new status.

Thursday, August 29

3:30 PM

Bart the Fink

Season 7 • Episode 15

Krusty the Clown loses everything after being audited by the IRS, then dies in a plane crash.

Thursday, August 29

4:30 PM

Homer the Smithers

Season 7 • Episode 17

Homer fills in for vacationing Smithers, forcing Mr. Burns to become independent.

Friday, August 30

12:00 AM

The Daughter Also Rises

Season 23 • Episode 13

Marge and Lisa's Valentine's Day plans take a turn when Lisa falls for an intellectual romantic.

Friday, August 30

12:30 AM

At Long Last Leave

Season 23 • Episode 14

When the Simpsons are kicked out of Springfield, they join an off-the-grid community near by.

Friday, August 30

1:00 AM

Exit Through the Kwik-E Mart

Season 23 • Episode 15

Bart decides to get back at Homer by becoming a graffiti artist; Apu struggles to stay in business.

Friday, August 30

1:30 AM

Pin Gal

Season 34 • Episode 17

A mysterious figure from Marge's past returns to coach her for a bowling tournament.

Friday, August 30

2:00 PM

The Day the Violence Died

Season 7 • Episode 18

Deprived of cartoon violence, Bart and Lisa crusade to bring Itchy and Scratchy back to television.

Friday, August 30

2:30 PM

A Fish Called Selma

Season 7 • Episode 19

Selma thinks something is fishy with Troy McClure's marriage proposal.

Friday, August 30

3:00 PM

Bart on the Road

Season 7 • Episode 20

Bart rents a car with a fake driver's license and takes a road trip with his pals.

Friday, August 30

3:30 PM

22 Short Films About Springfield

Season 7 • Episode 21

Vignettes highlight the lives of many Springfield residents.

Friday, August 30

4:00 PM

Raging Abe Simpson and His Grumbling Grandson in the Curse of the Flying Hellfish

Season 7 • Episode 22

Bart doubts his grandfather's old war stories until Mr. Burns tries to kill him.
